author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alcoa Corporation Announces Proposed Debt Offering
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Alcoa Corp:
* ALCOA CORPORATION ANNOUNCES PROPOSED DEBT OFFERING * ALCOA CORP - PROPOSED OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES BY A WHOLLY-OWNED UNIT OF ALCOA
* ALCOA CORP - NOTES WILL BE GUARANTEED ON SENIOR UNSECURED BASIS BY ALCOA & CERTAIN UNITS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
